explains: n. 合法；合法性；墨守法规

sentences.en: The arrangement is of doubtful legality.
sentences.cn: 这项约定是否合法值得怀疑。

sentences.en: The court will rule on the legality of the action.
sentences.cn: 法庭将裁定此举是否合法。

sentences.en: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
sentences.cn: 审计员已经质疑合同的合法性。
